content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Olivia Rodrigo__disambig_1

}}
American singer-songwriter and actress Olivia Rodrigo has received numerous accolades; including three Grammy Awards, seven Billboard Music Awards, four MTV Video Music Awards, five iHeartRadio Music Awards, four People's Choice Awards, an American Music Award, a Brit Award and a Juno Award.
Time named her as the "Entertainer of the Year" for 2021 and was included on 100 Next list. In the same year, Music Week crowned her as the "Artist of Year". Rodrigo was the top Songwriter at Billboard Hot 100 Songwriters year-end chart for 2021. The following year, she was honored as Billboard "Woman of the Year". Variety named her as the "Songwriter of the Year" in 2022 and "Storyteller of the Year" in 2023. The Ivors Academy considered her as the biggest Songwriter on the planet in 2021. Rodrigo was also awarded as the "Songwriter of the Year" at the ASCAP Pop Music Awards in 2022 and 2024.
She joined the elite list of Billboard 21 Under 21, Forbes 30 Under 30, Fortune 40 Under 40, Bloomberg 50 and Elle 100 ranking as one of the most influential people in global business.
